title: BLOCKCHAIN FOR EVERYONE
headline: We design and develop Blockchain-based solutions for enterprises.
description: Blockchain is a famous and revolutionizing technology, but most people don't know about it beyond cryptocurrency. Blockchain offers a lot more. We help businesses understand and integrate this technology to benefit from it and be part of the revolution.

error.invalid: Please provide a valid email address

dapp.headline: DApp Development
dapp.definition: A decentralized application is an application built on a decentralized network. A DApp is composed of a smart contract and a frontend interface.
dapp.benefits: Main benefits: Privacy, No downtime, Censorship resistant, and Immune to single points of failure.
dapp.description: At Blockbrainers, we really believe in a fully decentralized world. We design and implement Decentralized Applications running on Ethereum, EOS, or Hyperledger.

smartContractsDev.headline: Smart Contracts Development
smartContractsDev.definition: A smart contract is a self-executing program that runs on a decentralized network such as blockchain.
smartContractsDev.benefits: Main benefits: Transparency, Accuracy, Speed, Security, Storage, Savings, Trust...
smartContractsDev.description: At Blockbrainers, we design, develop, and deploy smart contracts to Ethereum or EOS Blockchain written in Solidity and C++.

smartContractsAudit.headline: Smart Contracts Audit
smartContractsAudit.definition: A smart contract audit is a smart contract's code analysis.
smartContractsAudit.benefits: Main benefits: Detection and correction of potentials design issues, errors in the code, and security vulnerabilities.
smartContractsAudit.description: At Blockbrainers, we share our smart contract expertise to audit yours.

digitalAssets.headline: Digital Assets
digitalAssets.definition: Digital assets include almost any digital content such as crypto-currency tokens listed on stock exchanges and more...
digitalAssets.benefits: Main benefits: No geographic barriers, No Middlemen, Increased liquidity, Reduced transaction costs, Redemption, Asset interoperability.
digitalAssets.description: At Blockbrainers, we create crypto tokens such as top-level ERC20 and ERC721 tokens. ERC20 and ERC721, the Ethereum token standard, is a technical standard used for smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

cryptoWallet.headline: Crypto Wallet
cryptoWallet.definition: A crypto wallet is a digital wallet that allows users to store and manage their digital assets such as cryptocurrencies (Ethers, Bitcoins) and tokens. There are different types of wallets.
cryptoWallet.benefits: Main benefits: Accessibility, Security, Privacy, Speed, Trust.
cryptoWallet.description: At Blockbrainers, we design, implement and integrate crypto wallets.

integration.headline: Blockchain Integration
integration.definition: Blockchain is a protocol and ledger for building an immutable historical record of transactions. It exists two types of blockchains, public and private.
integration.benefits: Main benefits: access to the network control, downtimes are reduced while uptimes are maximized, and scalability is facilitated.
integration.description: At Blockbrainers, integrate private blockchain to your business using Hyperledger.

training.headline: Blockchain Training
training.description: At Blockbrainers, we shared our knoledges. We offer functional or technical training for enterprise.

idea.headline: Idea
idea.text: You have an idea or need one, talk to us! We get to know each other, and we explain what value we can bring to you.

analysis.headline: Analysis
analysis.text: Blockbrainer's business analysts work hand to hand with you to define your business needs. Our architects set the technical requirements of the solution.

planning.headline: Planning
planning.text: After functional and technical analysis, we define the project's scope and roadmap.

MVP.headline: MVP
MVP.text: We build a Minimum Valuable Product, a simple implementation of the main features to test it with real users, collecting feedback, and get ready for the full implementation.

fullImplementation.headline: Full Implementation
fullImplementation.text: After having tested and approved MVP, we're ready to build the entire project.

maintenance.headline: Maintenance
maintenance.text: After successfully launch your project, we'll still support you, bringing improvement and fixing if needed.
